GENOTYPES.cultivar_notes: soft wheat with very high yield potential associated with a long grain-filling period

SOIL_METADATA.soil_profile_notes: the soil type was Tenuka clay loam (Fluventic Endoaquents in the USA classification), a deep, low permeability soil with high plant avaiable water capacity (Kear et al. 1967; Craigie et al., 2015).
the soil type was Tenuka clay loam (Fluventic Endoaquents in the USA classification), a deep, low permeability soil with high plant avaiable water capacity (Kear et al. 1967; Craigie et al., 2015).

WEATHER_METADATA.source_daily_weather: weather data were collected at a weather statio located within 2 km from the experimental field and provided daily minimum and maximum temperature, rainfall, solar radiation, and wind speed and relative humidity at 2 m.
